Field.Description: Go over any notes or information with the Night Auditor.

Field.DisplayName: Count Cash Drawer

Field.Description: Every 2 Hours ( F - P - I..) Crucial When Storming!

Field.DisplayName: Print arrivals report
Field.Description: For the following day and email reservation confirmation

Field.DisplayName: Block Rooms that have not been blocked for today

Field.Name: Block_x0020_any_x0020_new_x0020_
